sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage ( srchwrd_manage_id , srchwrd_manage_nm , srchwrd_conect_url , user_search_at , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #srchwrdManageId# , #srchwrdManageNm# , #srchwrdConectUrl# , #userSearchAt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage SET srchwrd_manage_id = #srchwrdManageId# , srchwrd_manage_nm = #srchwrdManageNm# , srchwrd_conect_url = #srchwrdConectUrl# , user_search_at = #userSearchAt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() WHERE 1 = 1 AND srchwrd_manage_id = #srchwrdManageId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage WHERE 1 = 1 AND srchwrd_manage_id = #srchwrdManageId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT srchwrd_manage_id , srchwrd_manage_nm , srchwrd_conect_url , user_search_at , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage WHERE srchwrd_manage_id = #srchwrdManageId#

SELECT srchwrd_manage_id , srchwrd_manage_nm , srchwrd_conect_url , user_search_at , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnrecentsrchwrdmanage WHERE 1=1
srchwrd_manage_id = #searchKeyword#
srchwrd_manage_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY srchwrd_manage_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
